alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 7:24PM EDT until June 17 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Bladen County in southeastern North Carolina... Robeson County in southeastern North Carolina... Central Dillon County in northeastern South Carolina... Northeastern Marlboro County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 724 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fayetteville to 8 miles northeast of Chavistown, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Dillon, Elizabethtown, Red Springs, Pembroke, Fairmont, Maxton, Mccoll, St. Pauls, Bladenboro, Rowland, Lake View, Rex, Hamer, Ammon, Hestertown, Shannon, White Oak, Smiths and Howellsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
